member.name: P:GameDesignFinal.My.Resources.Resources.ElementsOfGameDesign
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Elements of Game Design Questions featuring information from the textbook. @#EASY~'The smallest complete unit of play' is called a...?~Atom~Session~Trial~Game @#EASY~'Rules of thumb' that help you play a game are called...?~Heuristics~Combinations~Thoughts~Politics @#EASY~The heuristics that evaluate the state of the game are called...?~Positional heuristics~Directional heuristics~Analytic heuristics~Strategic heuristics @#EASY~When players can target other players in an arbitrary way that differential [rest of string was truncated]";.

member.name: T:GameDesignFinal.My.Resources.Resources
